title: Méditerranée, l'odyssée pour la vie
overview: The Mediterranean Sea, one of the centers of European civilisation, has been exploited for centuries by the countries bordering it. However, wildlife continues to develop there valiantly, developing treasures of invention and adaptability to survive human depredations. For four years, teams of passionate documentarians, with the help of scientists and specialists, investigated to bring back the most evocative and spectacular images of this struggle. Back on this extraordinary experience.
